name: Who are you talking to Terry?
name_original: Who are you talking to Terry?
description:
A short game in which you walk through the thoughts of Terry A. Davis, as depicted by Dillon Hall's video under the same name. An interactive experience guided by recordings of Terry himself.

You can download Terry's public domain operating system TempleOS, or donate to organizations working to ease the pain and suffering caused by mental illness (as requested by Terry's family) at his website https://templeos.org/

Basic controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Move around

Left mouse button - Interact

F - Toggle full screen

Escape - Unlock mouse
